fr.liglabl.adele.icasa.self.star.follow.me.exercice.seven.time

Interface MomentOfTheDayService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MomentOfTheDayImpl

    public interface MomentOfTheDayService
    The MomentOfTheDay service is used to retrieve the moment of the day. It also supports listeners that are notified when the moment of the day change.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MomentOfTheDay getMomentOfTheDay()
      Gets the moment of the day.
      void register(MomentOfTheDayListener listener)
      Register a listener that will be notified each time the current moment of the day changed.
      void unregister(MomentOfTheDayListener listener)
      Unregister a moment of the day listener.
